COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_GENERATE_KEY: An error occurred when generating key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_DELETE_KEY: An error occurred when deleting key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_IMPORT_KEY: An error occurred when importing key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_HTTPS_NEEDED: For encryption functionality to work, make sure you load this web site via https, not http.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.HINT_ABOUT_JSCRYPTO: Enables browser-level on-the-fly encryption in Files. Files are encrypted/decrypted right on this device, even the server itself cannot get access to non-encrypted content of paranoid-encrypted files. Encryption method is AES256.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.HINT_ENCRYPTED_FOLDER: Only files in Encrypted folder will be encrypted.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.LABEL_ALLOW_ENCRYPT_IN_PERSONAL_STORAGE: Allow encrypting files in Personal Storage
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.HINT_ENCRYPT_IN_PERSONAL_STORAGE: Every time while upload you will be asked if the file should be encrypted.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_LOAD_KEY: An error occurred when loading key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.HINT_ABOUT_KEY_EXPORT_POPUP: The key has been created and stored on this device. It's also recommended to click [Export key] to make a backup copy of this key. You should then store it in a safe place.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.INFO_EMPTY_JSCRYPTO_KEY: You have enabled encryption of uploaded files but haven't set any encryption key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_ENCRYPTION: An error occurred during the encryption process.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_EXPORT_KEY: An error occurred when exporting key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.HINT_ABOUT_KEY_EXPORT: To access encrypted files on other devices/browsers, export the key and then import it on another device/browser.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_POPUP_WINDOWS: You need to allow popups in the browser for the current web site.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_DECRYPTION: An error occurred during the decryption process. Perhaps, this file was encrypted with another key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.CONFIRM_DELETE_KEY: Are you sure you want to delete the key? You'll no longer be able to decrypt encrypted files on this device unless you import this key again.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.CONFIRM_UPLOAD_PLURAL: Upload {VALUE} without encryption?|Upload {VALUE} files without encryption?
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_FILE_SIZE_LIMIT: Cannot encrypt file larger than {VALUE} MB
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.MESSAGE_OUTDATED_ENCRYPTION_METHOD:
File '{FILENAME}' is encrypted using an outdated method. To encrypt it with an up-to-date method, follow these steps:
1. Download and decrypt the file
2. Make sure you have an OpenPGP private key in your account (Settings-> OpenPGP)
3. Upload the file again to the file storage with encryption. It will be automatically encrypted using your OpenPGP private key.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_NO_PRIVATE_KEY_FOUND_FOR_DECRYPT: No private key found for file decryption.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_NO_PUBLIC_KEYS_FOR_USERS_PLURAL: No public key found for {USERS} user.|No public keys found for {USERS} users.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.REPORT_SUCCESSFULL_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATIO: File was decrypted successfully. Digital signature is valid. Signed by:
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.INFO_SHARING_FOLDER: Encrypted files in this folder (if any) will not be shared.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.WARNING_PGP_KEYS_REQUIREMENT: PGP private and public keys are required to get Paranoid encryption to work. Please add them under OpenPGP settings section.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.INFO_IV_DOWNLOAD_FILE: You'll need IV and AES key if you want to download this file in encrypted form and decrypt it by other means, such as with OpenSSL tool.
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.INFO_IV_GET_AES_KEY: AES key can be got in Settings -> Paranoid Encryption
COREPARANOIDENCRYPTIONWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ALERT_SEND_ENCRYPTED_FILES: Some of the files you send are encrypted. To decrypt them, recipient will need Initialization Vector (IV) and AES key.

IOS.DESC_P1: Podemos configurar automaticamente o envio/recebimento de e-mails e dados de contatos e calendário no seu dispositivo iOS.
IOS.DESC_P2: Você sempre pode fazer isso depois, caso prefira,
IOS.DESC_P5: Com o novo perfil, você pode sincronizar e-mails e calendários em seu iOS, usando os seus aplicativos respectivos e nativos do sistema.
IOS.DESC_P7: também poderá usar o WebMail para acessar tais recursos.

MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.HEADING_DAVSYNC: DAV Sync via URL (para clientes Apple)
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.INFO_DAVSYNC: Use a URL abaixo para sincronizar calendário e contatos com Apple iCal ou dispositivo móveis como iPhone ou iPad (eles suportam sincronizar múltiplas pastas CalDAV ou CardDAV através de uma URL única).
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.INFO_DAVSYNC_CALENDAR_ONLY: Use the URL below to sync calendars with Apple iCal or a mobile device like iPhone or iPad (they all support syncing multiple CalDAV folders via a single URL).
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.INFO_DAVSYNC_CONTACTS_ONLY: Use the URL below to sync contacts with Apple iCal or a mobile device like iPhone or iPad (they all support syncing multiple CardDAV folders via a single URL).
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.INFO_DAVSYNC_IOS_DEVICE: A propósito, você pode obter seu perfil iOS automaticamente ao acessar este {WEBMAIL_URL} a partir de tal dispositivo.
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.ACTION_GET_IOS_PROFILE: Configurar e-mail, contatos e calendário no seu dispositivo iOS
MOBILESYNCWEBCLIENT.INFO_DAVSYNC_URLS: Se o seu cliente CalDAV ou CardDAV precisa de URLs separadas para cada calendário ou contatos (como o Mozilla Thunderbird Lightning ou Evolution), use as URLs abaixo. Note que o Sogo Connector, usado com Thunderbird, requer %40 no lugar do arroba (@).

OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.INFO_SHARING_NOT_SUPPORTED: The sharing of this file is not supported. The file is encrypted using the old encryption mode. The file must be uploaded and encrypted using the modern encryption mode. Please download and upload the file again.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_ON_DOWNLOAD: There was an error downloading file.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_ONLY_PASSWORD_BASED: Without selected recipient, only Password-based encryption is allowed.

OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_STORE_PASSWORD: If you don't send email now, store the password somewhere. You will not be able to recover it otherwise
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_ENCRYPTED_EMAIL: The file is encrypted using {USER}'s PGP public key. You can send the link via encrypted email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_GENERATE_KEY: An error occurred when generating OpenPGP key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_IMPORT_KEY: An error occurred when importing OpenPGP key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_IMPORT_NO_KEY_FOUND: No OpenPGP keys found for import.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_KEY_NOT_DECODED: You might have entered the wrong password for {USER} key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DELETE_KEY: An error occurred when deleting OpenPGP key.

OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PUBLIC_KEY_FOUND_FOR_VERIFY: No public key found for message verification.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PRIVATE_KEYS_FOR_USERS_PLURAL: No private key found for {USERS} user.|No private keys found for {USERS} users.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PRIVATE_KEY_FOUND_FOR_DECRYPT: No private key found for message decryption.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.MESSAGE_SUBJECT: The encrypted file was shared with you: '{FILENAME}'
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.MESSAGE_BODY:
Hi, you can get the encrypted file here:
{URL}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ENCRYPTED_WITH_PASSWORD_MESSAGE_BODY: Hi,{BR}you can get the encrypted file here: {URL}{BR}File encrypted with password: {PASSWORD}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_SIGN: An error occurred during signing the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_VERIFY: An error occurred during verifying the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_ENCRYPT: An error occurred during encrypting the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DECRYPT: An error occurred during decrypting the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_ENCRYPT_OR_SIGN: An error occurred during encrypting or signing the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DECRYPT_OR_VERIFY: An error occurred during decrypting or verifying the data.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.MESSAGE_FILE_IS_ALREADY_SHARED: This file is already shared to {EMAIL}. If you share it again, the older sharing link will no longer be valid. Proceed?
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ENCRYPTED_WITH_KEY_MESSAGE_BODY: Hi,{BR}{BR}You can get the encrypted file here: {URL}{BR}{BR}The file is encrypted using {USER}'s PGP public key.You can decrypt it if you're logged in {SYSNAME} system. If you're not logged in there, you'll be able to download the encrypted file only. You can decrypt it using other PGP tools then.{BR}{BR}Regards,{BR}{SYSNAME}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_PASSWORD_DECRYPT: An error occurred during decrypting the data. Perhaps, the password is wrong.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ENCRYPTED_LINK_MESSAGE_BODY: Hello,{BR}You can download the file at: {URL}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ENCRYPTED_LINK_MESSAGE_BODY_WITH_PASSWOR: Hello,{BR}You can download the file at: {URL}{BR}The download link is password-protected. Your password is: {PASSWORD}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.LINK_MESSAGE_BODY:
Hello,
You can download the file at: {URL}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.PUBLIC_LINK_MESSAGE_SUBJECT: The file was shared with you: '{FILENAME}'
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATION: File was decrypted successfully. Couldn't verify its digital signature, though.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.REPORT_SUCCESSFULL_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATIO: File was decrypted successfully. Digital signature is valid. Signed by:
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SEND_LINK: You can send the link via email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SEND_DIFFERENT_CHANNEL:
You can send the link via email. The password must be sent using a different channel.
You will be able to retrieve the password when need.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SIGN_EMAIL: The email will be signed using your private key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.INFO_PASSWORD_PROTECT_ONLY_FILES: Shareable links for folders don't support password protection.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_NOT_SIGN_EMAIL: The email will not be signed.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SEND_LINK_AND_PASSWORD: You can send the link and the password via encrypted email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SEND_LINK_AND_PASSWORD_SIGNED: You can send the link and the password via digitally signed encrypted email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SIGN_FILE: Will sign the data with your private key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_NOT_SIGN_FILE_REQUIRES_KEYBASED_ENC: Will not sign the data. Requires key-based encryption.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_NOT_SIGN_FILE_REQUIRES_PRIVATE_KEY: Will not sign the data. Requires your PGP private key in Settings.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_EMAIL: You can send the link via email. The password must be sent using a different channel. Store the password somewhere. You will not be able to recover it otherwise.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_MESSAGE_SUBJECT: The secure message was shared with you
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_KEY_RECIPIENT: Selected recipient has PGP public key. The message can be encrypted using this key.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_PASSWORD_BASED: The password must be sent using a different channel. Store the password somewhere. You will not be able to recover it otherwise.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_MESSAGE_LIFETIME: The message will be accessable till {DATETIME}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_MESSAGE_BODY_NOT_ENCR: Hello,{BR}{EMAIL} user sent you a self-destructing secure email.{BR}You can read it by the following link: {URL}{BR}The message will be accessible for {HOURS} hours starting from {CREATING_TIME_GMT}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_MESSAGE_BODY: Hello,{BR}{EMAIL} user sent you a self-destructing secure email.{BR}You can read it by the following link: {URL}{BR}The message will be accessible for {HOURS} hours starting from {CREATING_TIME_GMT}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.SELF_DESTRUCT_LINK_MESSAGE_BODY_WITH_PAS: Hello,{BR}{EMAIL} user sent you a self-destructing secure email.{BR}You can read it by the following link: {URL}{BR}The message is password-protected. The password is: {PASSWORD}{BR}The message will be accessible for {HOURS} hours starting from {CREATING_TIME_GMT}
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_ENCRYPTED_SIGNED_EMAIL: The file is encrypted using recipient's PGP public key. You can send the link via digitally signed encrypted email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_KEY: The corresponding PGP key was not found. You must be logged in {SYSNAME} service and have the corresponding PGP private key to get access to Self-Destructing Secure Email.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_SELF_DESTRUCT: The Self-destructing secure emails supports plain text only. Click OK to remove all the formatting and continue. Also, attachments cannot be encrypted or signed.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_PASSWORD_BASED_ENCRYPTION: The Password-based encryption will be used.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_KEY_BASED_ENCRYPTION: The Key-based encryption will be used.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.HINT_NO_KEY_RECIPIENT: Selected recipient has no PGP public key. The Key-based encryption is not allowed.
OPENPGPFILESWEBCLIENT.LABEL_ENTER_PASSPHRASE: Enter the password for PGP private key {KEY}

OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_TO_ENCRYPT_SPECIFY_RECIPIENTS: Para criptografar sua mensagem, você precisa especificar ao menos um destinatário.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_MESSAGE_SIGNED_ENCRYPTED_SUCCSESS: Mensagem foi assinada e criptografada com sucesso.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_TEXT_CONTAINS_NO_KEYS_TO_IMPORT: The text contains no keys that can be imported.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_TEXT_CONTAINS_KEYS_FOR_IMPORT: The text contains the following keys that are available for import
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_TEXT_CONTAINS_KEYS_ALREADY_IN_SYSTE: Keys that are already in the system will not be imported
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_TEXT_CONTAINS_KEYS_EXTERNAL_PRIVATE: External private keys are not supported and will not be imported
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_TEXT_CONTAINS_KEYS_WITH_NO_EMAIL: Keys with no email address in their names
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_IMPORT_NO_KEY_FOUND: Nenhuma chave OpenPHP encontrada para importação.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_KEY_SUCCESSFULLY_IMPORTED_PLURAL: Chave OpenPGP importada com sucesso.|Chaves OpenPGP importadas com sucesso.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_IMPORT_KEY: Ocorreu um erro ao importar chaves OpenPGP.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_IMPORT_NO_KEY_SELECTED: Nenhuma chave OpenPGP selecionada para importação.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_GENERATE_KEY: Ocorreu um erro ao gerar chave OpenPGP.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DECRYPT: Ocorreu um erro ao descriptografar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_KEY_NOT_DECODED: Você pode ter informado a senha errada para a chave {USER}.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_SIGN: Ocorreu um erro ao assinar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_VERIFY: Ocorreu um erro ao verificar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_ENCRYPT: Ocorreu um erro ao criptografar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_ENCRYPT_OR_SIGN: Ocorreu um erro durante a criptografia ou assinatura da mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DECRYPT_OR_VERIFY: Ocorreu um erro ao descriptografar ou verificar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_DELETE_KEY: Ocorreu um erro ao excluir chave OpenPGP.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PUBLIC_KEYS_FOR_USERS_PLURAL: Nenhuma chave pública encontrada para o usuário {USERS}.|Chaves públicas não foram encontradas para os usuários {USERS}.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PUBLIC_KEY_FOUND_FOR_VERIFY: Nenhuma chave pública encontrada para verificação da mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PRIVATE_KEYS_FOR_USERS_PLURAL: Nenhuma chave privativa encontrada para o usuário {USERS}.|Chaves privativos não foram encontradas para os usuários {USERS}.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_NO_PRIVATE_KEY_FOUND_FOR_DECRYPT: Nenhuma chave privativa encontrada para descriptografar a mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_SAVE_ENCRYPTED_DRAFT: Salvar rascunho descriptografado? Você ainda conseguirá enviar e-mail a partir do mesmo, mas não conseguirá editar o texto no corpo da mensagem.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_HTML_TO_PLAIN_FORMATTING: OpenPGP suporta apenas texto puro. Clique em OK para remover toda a formatação e prosseguir.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_HTML_TO_PLAIN_ATTACHMENTS: Além disso, anexos não podem ser criptografrados ou assinados, permanecendo como estão
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_MESSAGE_SUCCESSFULLY_DECRYPTED_AN: A mensagem foi descriptografada e verificada com sucesso.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_MESSAGE_SUCCESSFULLY_DECRYPTED: A mensagem foi descriptografada com sucesso.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_MESSAGE_SUCCESSFULLY_DECRYPTED_AN: A mensagem foi descriptografada com sucesso e não foi assinada durante a criação.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_MESSAGE_SUCCESSFULLY_VERIFIED: A mensagem foi verificada com sucesso.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_DELETE_KEY: Você tem certeza que deseja excluir a chave OpenPGP para {KEYEMAIL}?
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_KEYS_EXIST_PLURAL: You already have an OpenPGP key for email of your account.|You already have an OpenPGP keys for all emails of your accounts.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE_NO_PRIVATE_KEY: The message is encrypted. But there is no appropriate PGP private key in OpenPGP section in Settings.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_ALLOW_AUTOSAVE: Check "Allow autosave in Drafts" setting in Mail module. Desabilite essa opção caso não queira que o servidor armazene rascunhos descriptografados. Você ainda será capaz de salvar rascunhos manualmente (Ctrl-S).
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_EMPTY_PUBLIC_KEYS: Você não possui quaisquer chaves públicas.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_EMPTY_PRIVATE_KEYS: Você não possui quaisquer chaves privativas.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_VERIFY_PASSWORD: Before the OpenPGP private key can be shown, we need to verify this key's password.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_MESSAGE_SUCCESSFULLY_DECRYPTED_BUT: Message was successfully decrypted but wasn't verified.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.REPORT_KEY_IN_CLIPBOARD: The key has been copied to the clipboard.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_SEND_KEY: Would you like to send your public OpenPGP key to {EMAIL}?
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_SEND_PRIVATE_KEY: Sending the private key over email is insecure and should be avoided if possible. Click 'OK' only if you know what you're doing.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_EMPTY_EXTERNAL_PUBLIC_KEYS: You don't have any external public keys.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.ERROR_EMAILS_DO_NOT_MATCH: Key and contact emails do not match
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.LABEL_REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE: Remember OpenPGP key password until you log out or close this tab in the browser.
OPENPGPWEBCLIENT.INFO_REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE: If not checked, the system will ask for your OpenPGP key password every time it's needed.

PERSONALFILES.INFO_NOTFOUND: The item does not exist or cannot be accessed.

RECAPTCHAWEBCLIENTPLUGIN.ERROR_RECAPTCHA_VERIFICATION_DID_NOT_COM: You did not complete the reCAPTCHA verification properly.

ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.INFO_CREDENTIALS: Use your login "{LOGIN}" and password as credentials.
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.INFO_DOWNLOAD: NB: The above information is only needed if you wish to log into chat from mobile or desktop client:
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.WARNING_SAVE_BEFORE_APPLY: The chat settings need to be saved before any changes to RocketChat could be applied
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.HINT_CONFIGS_NEEDED_VALUES: In order to work properly it is necessary to have RocketChat settings as follows:
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.HINT_CONFIGS_CORRECT: All the required configuration options are set to correct values.
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.HINT_CONFIGS_INCORRECT: The required configuration options are not set to correct values.
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.HINT_APPLY_TEXTS: To apply text changes (Site Name and Home) to RocketChat click the button below.
ROCKETCHATWEBCLIENT.HINT_APPLY_CSS: To apply CSS changes necessary to display RocketChat in our Default colors click the button below.

S3CORPORATEFILESTORAGE.INFO_NOTFOUND: The item does not exist or cannot be accessed.

S3FILESTORAGE.INFO_HOST: For AWS S3, leave empty. For DigitalOcean Spaces, set to your Endpoint value (e.g.: nyc1.digitaloceanspaces.com).
S3FILESTORAGE.INFO_REGION: For AWS S3, specify region value. For DigitalOcean Spaces, set to "us-east-1".

SHAREDFILES.INFO_NOTFOUND: The item does not exist or cannot be accessed.
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_LEAVE_FILES_SHARE_PLURAL: Leave share of the {NAME} file?|Leave share of the selected files?
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_LEAVE_FOLDERS_SHARE_PLURAL: Leave share of the {NAME} folder?|Leave share of the selected folders?
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_LEAVE_ITEMS_SHARE: Leave share of the selected items?
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_NOT_ALL_ITEMS_SHARED: Please note that some of the selected items are your own and it's impossible to leave share for them. Leave share for the rest of the selected items?
SHAREDFILES.ERROR_NOT_POSSIBLE_TO_SHARE_WITH_YOURSEL: Not possible to share with yourself
SHAREDFILES.ERROR_USER_NOT_EXISTS: Unable to share files with non-existing users.
SHAREDFILES.ERROR_DUPLICATE_USERS_BACKEND: User can get the rights to either read or write.
SHAREDFILES.INFO_SHARING_NOT_SUPPORTED: The sharing of this file is not supported. The file is encrypted using the old encryption mode. The file must be uploaded and encrypted using the modern encryption mode. Please download and upload the file again.
SHAREDFILES.INFO_NO_SUGGESTED_CONTACTS_WITH_PGPKEY: No contacts with PGP keys found
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_ADD_TEAMMATE: Did you mean to add {EMAIL} teammate?
SHAREDFILES.WARNING_SELECT_TEAMMATE: Please select one of the teammates.
SHAREDFILES.WARNING_NO_TEAMMATE_SELECTED: There are no teamemates with {EMAIL} email. Please select one of the teammates.
SHAREDFILES.CONFIRM_SAVE_SHARES_WITHOUT_LAST_EMAIL: Last entered teammate {EMAIL} was not added to the list. Proceed without them?
SHAREDFILES.CANNOT_SHARE_DIRECTORY_IN_ECRYPTED_STORA: It is not possible to share a directory in encrypted storage.
SHAREDFILES.INCORRECT_FILE_NAME: Can't share the file, please try renaming it.
SHAREDFILES.WARNING_SHARES_CHANGED_BY_OTHER_USER: Cannot save shares as they were updated by another user. Shares will now be reset to show the latest state.

STANDARDAUTHWEBCLIENT.HEADING_CREATE_FIRST_ACCOUNT: Enter password to be able to log in this user
STANDARDAUTHWEBCLIENT.CONFIRM_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete account?

TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ABOUT_TWOFACTORAUTH: Increase your security by enabling two factor verification for your account.
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ABOUT_CONFIRMATION: Accessing Two Factor Verification settings requires confirmation of your account password
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ABOUT_TWOFACTORAUTH_USE: You can use a mobile application like Google Authenticator to scan the QR code below. Alternatively, you can enter your secret key there. Mobile app will then be able to generate one-time codes you'll need to additionaly enter during the login procedure.
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ENTER_CODE: Now, to make sure that everything is configured correctly, get a new code value in the mobile app and enter it here.
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ABOUT_TWOFACTORAUTH_ENABLED: For better security, two factor verification is enabled for your account.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_MODULE_NOT_ENABLED: Please note that it is strictly recommended to turn on two factor authentication.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_TFA_ENABLED_FOR_USER: Two factor authentication is enabled for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_TFA_DISABLED_FOR_USER: Two factor authentication is not enabled for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_DISABLE_TFA: Are you sure you want to turn off two factor authentication for {USER} user?
TWOFACTORAUTH.REPORT_DISABLE_USER_TFA: Two factor authentication was successfully turned off for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_DISABLE_USER_TFA: Error occurred while turning off two factor authentication for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SETUP_BACKUP_CODES: These printable one-time passcodes allow you to sign in when away from your phone, like when you’re traveling.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SHOW_BACKUP_CODES: {COUNT} single-use codes are active at this time, but you can generate more as needed.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_KEEP_CODES_SAFE: Keep these backup codes somewhere safe but accessible.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_USE_CODE_ONCE: You can only use each backup code once.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_GET_NEW_CODES: If you get a new set of backup codes, existing codes will be deactivated.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_ENTER_BACKUP_CODE: Enter one of your 8-character backup codes
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_TWA_OPTIONS: You can use Authenticator app (for example, Google Authenticator or Yubico Authenticator) or Security Key (for example, Yubico key).
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_AUTHENTICATOR_APP: Allows for getting verification codes, even when your phone is offline. Available for Android and iPhone.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_DISABLE_AUTHENTICATOR_APP: Are you sure you want to stop using Authenticator App for two factor verification?
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_SECURITY_KEYS: Verification method that allows for signing in using a security device (for example, YubiKey). The keys can connect to your phone directly, via Bluetooth, or plug into your computer’s USB port.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_ADD_SECURITY_KEY: Error occurred while adding security key.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_VERIFY_SECURITY_KEY: Error occurred while verifying security key.
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_CREATE_SECURITY_KEY: Please follow the instructions in the popup window
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_SECURITY_KEY_NAME: Specify display name of the security key
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_SETUP_SECRET_KEY_NAME: Error occurred while setting up security key name.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_REMOVE_SECURITY_KEY: Are you sure you want to delete {KEYNAME} key?
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_DELETE_SECURITY_KEY: Error occurred while deleting security key.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_TWA_VERIFICATION: This extra step is intended to confirm it’s really you trying to sign in
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_SECURITY_KEY_VERIFICATION: Please follow the instructions in the popup window
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_INSERT_TOUCH_SECURITY_KEY: Insert your security key into the USB port and touch it
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_VERIFICATION: Try using your security key again or try another way to verify it's you
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_VERIFICATION_NO_: Try using your security key again to verify it's you
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_HTTPS_NEEDED: For Security key functionality to work, make sure you load this application via https, not http
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your current browser doesn't support adding Security Keys. Please try a different browser, for example Google Chrome
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_AUTHENTICATOR_APP_VERIFICATION: Specify verification code from Authenticator app
TWOFACTORAUTH.LABEL_TRUST_DEVICE_PLURAL: Don't ask again on this device for {COUNT} day|Don't ask again on this device for {COUNT} days
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_DEVICE: You'll need to sign in again on that device.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_LOGOUT_DEVICE: Error occurred while logging out from device.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_TRUST_DEVICES: Two factor verification will be skipped on devices you trust.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_REVOKE_ALL: You can revoke trusted status from your devices that skip Two factor Verification.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_REVOKE_ALL: To sign in again, you'll need to provide a second factor.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_REVOKE_TRUST: Error occurred while revoking trust from devices.
